member.name: M:SellingElectronicWebsite.Controllers.Employee.ProductController.GetAll(System.String)
member.remarks: In default, value of sortBy is null.If sortBy is null, api will return product sort by name ascending. If you want to sort, you can enter value for "sortBy" parameter.

member.name: M:SellingElectronicWebsite.Controllers.Employee.ProductController.GetByPage(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.remarks: Enter pageIndex, pageSize, sortBy. Api will return list products and sort(if sortBy != null).
